q_ch: 我是Advanced Sewers，我尚未完成的任务有哪些，对应的顾客都是谁？
q_en: I am Advanced Sewers. What are the tasks I have not yet completed?
gt:
Hello there! 😄 Let's take a look at the tasks that the "Advanced Sewers" working group has not yet completed. Here's a handy table for you:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Order Product ID | Planned Number | Completed Number |
|---------|------------------|------------------|------------------|----------------|------------------|
| 22      | 2024-04-09       | 2024-04-22       | 22               | 115            | 60               |
| 33      | 2024-07-17       | 2024-08-03       | 33               | 120            | 0                |

It looks like there are a couple of tasks that still need some attention. Keep up the great work! 🚀

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the group with the name "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id, start_time, end_time, order_product_id, planned_number, completed_number FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '8' AND status != 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks that are not yet completed for the working group "Advanced Sewers"
